briefdescription.para: Source file path. Maybe empty if source file was on memory.
Chunk Data. Maybe empty if source file was not glb format. https://www.khronos.org/registry/glTF/specs/2.0/glTF-2.0.html#chunks [0] must JSON [1] must BIN [2...] may exists.

JSON chunk ToString
This chunk MUST be the very first chunk of Binary glTF asset

BIN chunk
This chunk MUST be the second chunk of the Binary glTF asset
uri = data: base64デコード uri = 相対パス。File.ReadAllBytes

memberdef.argsstring: (string targetPath, string json, glTF gltf, IReadOnlyList< GlbChunk > chunks, IStorage storage, MigrationFlags migrationFlags)
memberdef.name: GltfData

memberdef.argsstring: (glTFBufferView view, int count, int byteOffset, glComponentType componentType)
memberdef.name: GetIntIndicesFromView

briefdescription.para: Get indices and cast to int

listitem.para: JSON is parsed but not validated as glTF
For glb, bin chunks are already available
